get_file_data.name: get_file_data
get_file_data.description: Takes the absolute path of a file stored on the local machine and returns its text contents as a string. Handles text/code files (UTF-8), PDFs (parsing), and rejects unsupported types (images/binaries) based on extension. Enforces security (disallowed paths) and size limits (30MB).

file_path.description: The absolute path to the text, code, or PDF file to be read.

generate_elasticsearch_query.name: generate_elasticsearch_query
generate_elasticsearch_query.description: Generates syntactically valid Elasticsearch DSL queries for the entities-v4 index based on natural language descriptions. Uses GPT-4o-mini with embedded mapping, field descriptions, and few-shot examples to translate user queries like 'Fetch my W2s' or 'Find all documents under FolderId ABC' into proper Elasticsearch query objects. Returns validated query JSON that can be executed directly against the entities-v4 index. Handles error cases including ambiguous queries, invalid fields, and API failures.

query.description: Natural language query describing the search requirement. Examples: 'Fetch my W2s', 'Fetch all documents under FolderId ABC', 'Find all receipts that are not PCI', 'Search for documents with offering ID xyz'. Be specific about entity types (DOCUMENT/FOLDER), field values, and search criteria.
